Protected Member Functions

 CompileBlockData ()
 DecompileBlockData ()

Detailed Description

Block for defining a Creature's current state. The binary format of this block is completely un-understood.

Instantiate a new CREABlock

Parameters:
$prayfile The PRAYFile associated with this CREA block. It is allowed to be null.
$name The name of this block.
$content This block's content.
$flags Any flags this block may have
